article.Heading: Govt to present Budget 2016 on February 29: Jayant Sinha
article.Summary: The government will present the Union Budget for 2016-17 on February 29, Minister of State for Finance Jayant Sinha said on Thursday.
article.Body: The government will present the Union Budget for 2016-17 on February 29, Minister of State for Finance Jayant Sinha said on Thursday.
